presentations.title: Hello, I am Dimitri Avila Y.
presentations.subtitle: Full stack developer
presentations.shortPresentation: Full Stack Developer with 7 years of experience, my expertise revolves around JavaScript technologies. Throughout my career, I have successfully delivered projects across various domains, including e-commerce, governmental institutions, and the financial sector. My proficiency extends to a wide spectrum of technologies, encompassing React, Vue.js, Angular, Node.js, PHP, as well as SQL and NoSQL databases.

knowledgeAreas.description: I thrive on creating projects from the ground up, translating a designer's vision into a fully functional web experience.
